tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_materials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_path VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE course_materials (
  material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name STRING,
  material_type STRING,
  material_url STRING,
  uploaded_by STRING,
  uploaded_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE course_materials (
    material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_type VARCHAR(50),
    material_name VARCHAR(100),
    course_id UUID,
    material_file BYTEA
);
